law.catch_line: Workers' compensation insurers to provide proof of coverage to commissioner of Department of Workers' Claims.
law.text: Any insurer providing workers' compensation insurance coverage for a Kentucky location shall provide proof of coverage to the commissioner of the Department of Workers' Claims in the Labor Cabinet in accordance with the requirements of the chapter.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1311, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 181, sec. 70, effective April 4, 1994.
